has said he supports legislation proposed by fellow Republicans, Tennessee Senator Bob Corker and Indiana Representative Mike Pence , that would remove the Fed's employment mandate and have it focus solely on keeping prices stable. Bernanke said inflation is expected to persist below the levels that Fed policy makers have judged to be consistent with their dual mandate from congress for stable prices and maximum employment. He said Michael Gove was`` inflicting an ideological experiment'' on pupils.He said the Michael Government's flagship free schools were being approved without consultation with people who live nearby, while existing local schools are being left to fall into disrepair . On Monday, it was reported that at least 15 free school group had been promised or already given state funds for their buildings. It comes after a national school rebuilding programme was scrapped last year

'' said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor.`` It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars.''`` Now, let me say,'' Mike Pence continued, to be very clear, Mr. Speaker, this legislation does not cut one penny from title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at title X clinics across this country: breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.

`` Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti,'' Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.
